name: Fathom Acapulco Fins
description: Versatile fins that add efficiency to your swimming and snorkelling. The centre pocket channels water and stabilizes the fin, so you use less energy to gain forward speed.Durable thermoplastic construction.Flexible centre panel focuses thrust and increases efficiency.Soft, comfortable foot pocket.Open heel with adjustable strap accommodates a wide range of foot sizes.S/M fits euro 38-41. L/XL fits euro 42-46.
